translation.Message_0_Page_0: My name is <name_npc>. I'm the squad leader of the remaining soldiers here.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: The French Military is in shambles. We appear to be the only ones left.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: Here I oversee guard duty and manage everything below <color=legendary>Colonel Jourdan</color>.
translation.Message_0_Page_3: I'm also in control of the armory. This includes all the weapons, ammunition, and magazines we have.
translation.Message_0_Page_4: There's a lot to handle between inventory and my men, but I can manage it.
